channel.title: CVE Feed for XLPlugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for XLPlugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1120|2024-08-28T15:07:56.103Z -- xlplugins -- nextmove%20lite%20%E2%80%93%20thank%20you%20page%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The NextMove Lite – Thank You Page for WooCommerce and Finale Lite – Sales Countdown Timer & Discount for WooCommerce plugins for WordPress are vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the download_tools_settings() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.17.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export system information that can aid attackers in an attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-25092|2024-08-09T19:42:16.495Z -- xlplugins -- nextmove%20lite
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in XLPlugins NextMove Lite.This issue affects NextMove Lite: from n/a through 2.17.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32104|2024-07-03T18:21:14.914Z -- xlplugins -- nextmove%20lite
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in XLPlugins NextMove Lite.This issue affects NextMove Lite: from n/a through 2.18.1.
